testcase.name: Verify with the Cross Dropdown input selection details
testcase.system-out: Given the user signin with the Respective role credential details...........passed Then the page will Navigate to the Dashboard screen of the main pages.......passed Then click on the dashboard menu as Activities module name..................passed And click on the Partial Uprootment screen..................................passed Then click on the search farmer input field.................................passed And Select farmer from the auto suggestion keywords list....................passed And check with the selected farmer plot details.............................passed Then check with the Total plot area input details...........................passed And check with the Total Palm area input details............................passed Then check with the Crop in Left out area dropdown selection................passed And Check with the Survey number input validations details..................passed Then check with the CropIncome Dropdown selection...........................passed And check with the Is Boundary fencing checkbox selection field.............passed And check with the Is plot handled by care taker checkbox selection field...passed Then Validate with the Caretaker name input field...........................passed And validate with the Caretaker mobile number details.......................passed Then check with the landmark input details..................................passed When Click on the Plantation Details action button..........................passed Then check with the Sapling nursery dropdown input selection................passed And check with the Sprouts vendor input details.............................passed Then check with the Origin of saplings input selection details..............passed And check with the Cross dropdown input selection details...................passed
